Lyric:
[by:柠檬味海风Sound]
[00:00.00]indentations of my underclothes
[00:05.16]under where your hands would go
[00:08.84]we'd keep the talking to a minimal
[00:13.61]just elongate the syllables
[00:16.10]to make em into moans

[00:26.53]i know the chances of this stay remote
[00:30.64]i only think it when the lights are low
[00:34.92]but if the fantasy's reciprocal
[00:39.24]you never know
[00:40.63]you never know

[00:44.64]i'm like
[00:45.73]give me what my body wants
[00:48.69]the colour sum
[00:54.39]send me through the spectrum
[00:57.33]and i will come alive
[01:00.56]with your light in mine

[01:10.30]the distance is intangible
[01:14.58]you're a prism
[01:15.47]with your colours stretching out
[01:17.64]across the wall
[01:18.98]i can see but i can't touch
[01:23.16]it's all too much
[01:24.29]and not enough
[01:25.71]i don't want to give it up

[01:28.54]just 
[01:29.36]give me what my body wants
[01:32.35]the colour sum
[01:37.91]send me through the spectrum
[01:41.08]and i will come alive
[01:44.14]with your light in mine
[01:49.90]and i will come alive
[01:52.91]with your light in mine

[01:56.44]laying low
[01:58.78]breathe in slow
[02:00.75]if you're alone
[02:02.86]i'm coming for you

[02:05.14]laying low
[02:07.34]breathe in slow
[02:09.79]if you're alone
[02:11.53]i'm coming for you

[02:12.78]give me what my body wants
[02:16.08]the colour sum
[02:21.63]send me through the spectrum
[02:24.72]and i will come alive
[02:27.89]with your light in mine

[02:33.66]and i will come alive
[02:36.33]with your light in mine
